Uses of Package
adept.serialization

  • Packages that use adept.serialization 
    Package Description
    adept.restapi
    Provides interfaces for accessing DEFT algorithms as RESTful services
    adept.serialization
    Provides interfaces and classes for ADEPT data (de)serialization in XML, JSON and Binary format
    adept.utilities
    Provides utility classes and functions for creating ADEPT Document objects, for tokenization, regression test, benchmark test, profiler, command-line application and file conversions.
  • Classes in adept.serialization used by adept.restapi 
    Class and Description
    JSONSerializer
    JSON serializer.
  • Classes in adept.serialization used by adept.serialization 
    Class and Description
    AbstractSerializer
    Abstract class for serialization that enforces a srialization type to be specified.
    ISerializer
    Interface that supports methods for serialization.
    JSONSerializer
    JSON serializer.
    SerializationType
    The Enum SerializationType.
  • Classes in adept.serialization used by adept.utilities 
    Class and Description
    BinaryFromJSONSerializer
    The Class BinaryFromJSONSerializer.
    JSONSerializer
    JSON serializer.
    SerializationType
    The Enum SerializationType.
    XMLSerializer
    Performs XML serialization.
